title: Chemical Saver Well Settings
description: User-configurable settings for chemical dosage optimization per well

target_ppm.description: The required concentration of chemical in the water phase (Parts Per Million)

chemical_density.description: Density of the chemical in kg/L (used for mass-to-volume conversion)

active_intensity.description: The percentage of active ingredient in the chemical drum (%)

cost_per_gallon.description: Cost of the chemical in USD per gallon

min_pump_rate.description: The physical minimum limit of the pump in GPD (Safety constraint)

max_pump_rate.description: The physical maximum limit of the pump in GPD (Safety constraint)

unit_preference.description: User preference for volume units display

created_at.description: Timestamp when settings were first created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when settings were last modified

updated_by.description: User ID who last modified the settings
